00046 /*..........................................................................*/
00047 void QS_u8_(uint8_t d) {
00048     QS_INSERT_ESC_BYTE(d)
00049 }
00050 /*..........................................................................*/
00051 void QS_u16_(uint16_t d) {
00052     QS_INSERT_ESC_BYTE((uint8_t)d)
00053     d >>= 8;
00054     QS_INSERT_ESC_BYTE((uint8_t)d)
00055 }
00056 /*..........................................................................*/
00057 void QS_u32_(uint32_t d) {
00058     QS_INSERT_ESC_BYTE((uint8_t)d)
00059     d >>= 8;
00060     QS_INSERT_ESC_BYTE((uint8_t)d)
00061     d >>= 8;
00062     QS_INSERT_ESC_BYTE((uint8_t)d)
00063     d >>= 8;
00064     QS_INSERT_ESC_BYTE((uint8_t)d)
00065 }
00066 /*..........................................................................*/
00067 /*lint -e970 -e971            ignore MISRA rules 13 and 14 in this function */
00068 void QS_str_(char const *s) {
00069     while (*s != '\0') {
00070                                    /* ASCII characters don't need escaping  */
00071         QS_chksum_ = (uint8_t)(QS_chksum_ + (uint8_t)*s);
00072         QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)*s)
00073         ++s;
00074     }
00075     QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)0)
00076 }
00077 /*..........................................................................*/
00078 /*lint -e970 -e971            ignore MISRA rules 13 and 14 in this function */
00079 void QS_str_ROM_(char const Q_ROM * Q_ROM_VAR s) {
00080     uint8_t b;
00081     while ((b = (uint8_t)Q_ROM_BYTE(*s)) != (uint8_t)0) {
00082                                    /* ASCII characters don't need escaping  */
00083         QS_chksum_ = (uint8_t)(QS_chksum_ + b);
00084         QS_INSERT_BYTE(b)
00085         ++s;
00086     }
00087     QS_INSERT_BYTE((uint8_t)0)
00088 }
